actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to authorize voluntary withholding of District of Columbia, Maryland, and Virginia income taxes in the case of employees of the House of Representatives and the Senate.

summary.text: Authorizes the voluntary withholding of District of Columbia, Maryland, and Virginia income taxes in the case of employees of the House of Representatives and the Senate.

titles.title: A bill to authorize voluntary withholding of District of Columbia, Maryland, and Virginia income taxes in the case of employees of the House of Representatives and the Senate.
